summary: The trial lasted 12 months, and results showed a 15% reduction in blood pressure. This study evaluates the effect of Drug A on hypertension in 200 patients aged 40-60. The trial lasted a year and involved 200 people aged between 40 and 60. The results were published in the journal Hypertension.

A randomized study analyzing the effectiveness of Drug B in 500 diabetic patients over 6 months. The study was focusing on glucose level improvement. The results of the study were published in the Journal of the American College of Pharmacy. The trial involved 500 patients over six months.
